creditline: Gift of Ruth Bovey Stevens in Memory of Charles Bovey
description: George III salver with arms of Buckingham
inscription:
Marks; Inscription

Engraved on the upper surface are the arms of Buckingham.  On the underside is a modern applied silver plaque engraved with the following inscription: [Presented to CHARLES CRANSTON BOVEY by the DIRECTORS of GENERAL MILLS, INC.  In appreciation of his many years of valued service as a MEMBER OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS of WASHBURN CROSBY COMPANY & GENERAL MILLS, INC.  And as an expression of their warm affection. 1902-1949]
markings:
Marks; Inscription

Fully marked on underside.
title: Salver
